subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In a long-expected move, the team lets Larry Brown go, and it may try to avoid paying the more than $40 million owed him. Isiah Thomas, the Knicks' president, will now also be the coach.
snippet: In a long-expected move, the team lets Larry Brown go, and it may try to avoid paying the more than $40 million owed him. Isiah Thomas, the Knicks' president, will now also be the coach.
